Redmi Note 12 4G launching in India today: time, how to watch live stream, specifications, price

The Redmi Note 12 4G will launch today in India, alongside the Redmi 12C. Here's how you can watch its launch event live stream.

By
team91
-
Published On: March 30, 2023 | Last Updated: March 30, 2023
Highlights
  • The Redmi Note 12 4G will launch today in India, alongside the Redmi 12C.
  • The device will feature a 120Hz refresh rate AMOLED display, 33W fast charging, and a Snapdragon 685 processor.
  • Here’s everything you need to know about the soon-to-be-launched Redmi Note 12 4G.

Redmi will launch two new smartphones today in India, dubbed the Redmi Note 12 4G and the Redmi 12C. While the Redmi 12C will be an entry-level smartphone, the prime attraction of today’s launch will be the Redmi Note 12 4G, which will be a mid-range offering by the brand in the 4G smartphone segment. The Redmi Note 12 4G has already been launched in the global market, so we pretty much know everything about its specifications, features, and design. If you are interested in watching the Redmi Note 12 4G launch event live stream, we have got you covered. Let’s take a look at the Redmi Note 12 4G smartphone, how you can watch its launch event live, what its expected pricing could be, and, of course, its specifications and features.

Show Full Article

Redmi Note 12 4G launch time, how to watch live-stream

The Redmi Note 12 4G, alongside the Redmi 12C, will launch today in India (March 30th, 2023) at 12 noon via an online live-stream event. The event will be streamed on the company’s official website, but, to save you from the trouble, we have embedded the URL, which you can click right away and hit the notify button so that you can receive an alert right before the live-stream commences:

Redmi Note 12 4G price in India (expected)

The Redmi Note 12 4G might arrive in multiple memory variants. The base variant is expected to feature 4GB RAM and 128GB storage, and might be priced around Rs 13,000 including offers. The device is also rumoured to launch in 6GB RAM and 8GB RAM variants. Coming to the colour options, we can expect the Redmi Note 12 4G to be made available in Ice Blue, Onyx Gray, and Mint Green colours.

Also Read

Redmi Note 12 4G with 120Hz AMOLED display, Snapdragon 685, 50MP camera goes official ahead of India launch

Redmi Note 12 4G new colour option teased ahead of India launch later this month

Redmi Note 12 4G to launch in India on March 30th; Redmi Note 12 Turbo release date also confirmed

Redmi Note 12 4G specifications

Assuming that the Indian variant of the Redmi Note 12 4G will feature the same specification set when compared to its global variant, the Redmi Note 12 4G will feature a 6.67-inch FHD+ AMOLED DotDisplay with a 120Hz refresh rate. The device will make room for a centrally-aligned single punch-hole cutout for the selfie camera. Speaking of the cameras, the Redmi Note 12 4G will sport a 13MP selfie camera and a 50MP + 8MP + 2MP triple rear camera setup.

Under the hood, the Redmi Note 12 4G will come powered by a Snapdragon 685 processor, which could be coupled with up to 8GB RAM and up to 128GB storage. In terms of software, we can expect the Redmi Note 12 4G to boot Android 12-based MIUI 14 skin out of the box. Lastly, the device will feature a 5,000mAh battery with support for 33W fast charging over a USB Type-C charging port.
